ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Ports to Luclin
ygData.msgSnippet: The spells are new , the last patch put them in. A very nice thing for them to do, but then again, why not offer these ports so everyone goes and Buys
ygData.messageBody:
The spells are new , the last patch put them in.
A very nice thing for them to do, but then again, why
not offer these ports so everyone goes and Buys
LUCLIN....


A nice Marketing approach if I say so myself.

Rob


--- mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> wrote:
> So, how long have we druids had the ports to Luclin?
> I just heard
> about it, learned that the spells were in my home of
> Rivervale, and
> bought all I could use. Just wondered if this was
> very new, or if I
> simply have had my head up my backside. Hadn't seen
> the vendor
> before. In the back of the druid's guild in
> Rivervale.
>
> Anyone familiar with the Twilight Sea? Since I can
> port right there,
> to the island of the elementals, I was wondering if
> it would be nuts
> to try to solo there at lvl 33? Nice drops from
> those elementals, but
> I may try to get a group up if the solo thing is not
> workable.
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
>
